menu.copyright.title: About
menu.options.title: Options
menu.telemetry.title: LTSX Telemetry
menu.telemetry.content.title.1: LTSX will collect certain data while you play on multiplayer servers (limited to LTSX and BotWMCS) to improve the LTSX server and for AI analysis of player behavior.
menu.telemetry.content.title.2: The following data will always be collected when playing LTSX:
menu.telemetry.content.playLtsx.clientMo: - Whether the LTSX client has been modified
menu.telemetry.content.title.3: The following data may be collected under certain circumstances:
menu.telemetry.content.antiCheat.title: When the player triggers LTSX anti-cheat:
menu.telemetry.content.antiCheat.blockIn: - Recent block interaction data of the player
menu.telemetry.content.mediaPlayer.title: When the player uses a media player:
menu.telemetry.content.clientUpdate.titl: When the player updates the client:
menu.telemetry.content.conclusion: The above data will always or may be collected while playing LTSX. This data will be uploaded to the LTSX or BotWMCS server and does not include any private data.
